mapper.insert: insert into orderwork_table( orderwork_idx, product_idx, product_modelno, order_regdate, order_deadline, order_exdate, order_cnt, order_unit, order_unit_price, order_amt, orderwork_date, orderwork_status) values( orderwork_seq.nextval, #{product_idx}, #{product_modelno}, #{order_regdate}, #{order_deadline}, #{order_exdate}, #{order_cnt}, #{order_unit}, #{order_unit_price}, #{order_amt}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD'), '주문승인')
mapper.select: select orderwork_idx, product_idx, product_modelno, order_regdate, order_deadline, order_exdate, order_cnt, order_unit, order_unit_price, order_amt, orderwork_date, orderwork_status from orderwork_table where orderwork_status = '주문승인'
mapper.insert: insert into produce_table (produce_idx, orderwork_idx, process_name, orderwork_date, product_idx, product_modelno, order_regdate, order_deadline, order_exdate, order_cnt, order_unit, order_unit_price, order_amt, orderwork_status) values (produce_seq.nextval, #{orderwork_idx}, #{process_name}, #{orderwork_date}, #{product_idx}, #{product_modelno}, #{order_regdate}, #{order_deadline}, #{order_exdate}, #{order_cnt}, #{order_unit}, #{order_unit_price}, #{order_amt}, '생산진행')
mapper.select: select produce_idx, orderwork_idx, process_name, orderwork_date, product_idx, product_modelno, order_regdate, order_deadline, order_exdate, order_cnt, order_unit, order_unit_price, order_amt, produce_cnt, produce_losscnt, produce_badcnt, produce_processrate, orderwork_status from produce_table
mapper.update: update produce_table set produce_cnt = #{produce_cnt}, produce_losscnt=#{produce_losscnt}, produce_badcnt=#{produce_badcnt}, produce_processrate=#{produce_processrate}, orderwork_status = '생산완료'
